title: All The Rock & Metal Releases Turning 20 In 2025
description: Yes, Obituary's "Redneck Stomp" has been stomping for 20 years.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: Yes, Obituary's "Redneck Stomp" has been stomping for 20 years.
text: Yes, 2005 was 20 years ago…. and there were so many great metal albums released that year. Check out our comprehensive list of all the albums turning 20 in 2025 below and chime in with your favorite! Arch Enemy – Doomsday Machine As I Lay Dying – Shadows Are Security August Burns Red – Thrill Seeker Avenged Sevenfold – City of Evil Bolt Thrower – Those Once Loyal Bullet For My Valentine – The Poison Candlemass – Candlemass Cephalic Carnage – Anomalies Children of Bodom – Are You Dead Yet? Chimaira – Chimaira Chiodos – All’s Well That Ends Well Clutch – Robot Hive/Exodus Dark Tranquility – Character Despised Icon – The Healing Process DevilDriver – The Fury of Our Maker’s Hand Disturbed – Ten Thousand Fists Dope – American Apathy Dream Theater – Octavarium Epica – Consign To Oblivion Every Time I Die – Gutter Phenomenon Fear Factory – Transgression From Autumn To Ashes – Abandon Your Friends God Forbid – IV: Constitution of Treason Gojira – From Mars to Sirius Hate Eternal – I, Monarch High On Fire – Blessed Black Wings Immolation – Harnessing Ruin Job For A Cowboy – Doom Judas Priest – Angel of Retribution Kamelot – The Black Halo Korn – See You on the Other Side Kreator – Enemy of God Life of Agony – Broken Valley Lordi – The Monster Show Meshuggah – Catch Thirtythree Mudvayne – Lost And Found Napalm Death – The Code Is Red… Long Live The Code Nevermore – This Godless Endeavor Nile – Annihilation of the Wicked Nine Inch Nails – With Teeth Obituary – Frozen In Time Parkway Drive – Killing With A Smile Primordial – The Gathering Wilderness Protest The Hero – Kezia Queens of the Stone Age – Lullabies to Paralyze Rammstein – Rosenrot Scar Symmetry – Symmetric In Design Sevendust – Next Soilwork – Stabbing the Drama Static-X – Start A War Stick To Your Guns – For What It's Worth System of a Down – Mezmerize & Hypnotize The Black Dahlia Murder – Miasma The Red Chord – Clients Throwdown – Vendetta Trivium – Ascendancy Winds of Plague – A Cold Day In Hell
html:
Yes, 2005 was 20 years ago…. and there were so many great metal albums released that year. Check out our comprehensive list of all the albums turning 20 in 2025 below and chime in with your favorite!

Arch Enemy – Doomsday Machine

As I Lay Dying – Shadows Are Security

August Burns Red – Thrill Seeker

Avenged Sevenfold – City of Evil

Bolt Thrower – Those Once Loyal

Bullet For My Valentine – The Poison

Candlemass – Candlemass

Cephalic Carnage – Anomalies

Children of Bodom – Are You Dead Yet?

Chimaira – Chimaira

Chiodos – All’s Well That Ends Well

Clutch – Robot Hive/Exodus

Dark Tranquility – Character

Despised Icon – The Healing Process

DevilDriver – The Fury of Our Maker’s Hand

Disturbed – Ten Thousand Fists

Dope – American Apathy

Dream Theater – Octavarium

Epica – Consign To Oblivion

Every Time I Die – Gutter Phenomenon

Fear Factory – Transgression

From Autumn To Ashes – Abandon Your Friends

God Forbid – IV: Constitution of Treason

Gojira – From Mars to Sirius

Hate Eternal – I, Monarch

High On Fire – Blessed Black Wings

Immolation – Harnessing Ruin

Job For A Cowboy – Doom

Judas Priest – Angel of Retribution

Kamelot – The Black Halo

Korn – See You on the Other Side

Kreator – Enemy of God

Life of Agony – Broken Valley

Lordi – The Monster Show

Meshuggah – Catch Thirtythree

Mudvayne – Lost And Found

Napalm Death – The Code Is Red… Long Live The Code

Nevermore – This Godless Endeavor

Nile – Annihilation of the Wicked

Nine Inch Nails – With Teeth

Obituary – Frozen In Time

Parkway Drive – Killing With A Smile

Primordial – The Gathering Wilderness

Protest The Hero – Kezia

Queens of the Stone Age – Lullabies to Paralyze

Rammstein – Rosenrot

Scar Symmetry – Symmetric In Design

Sevendust – Next

Soilwork – Stabbing the Drama

Static-X – Start A War

Stick To Your Guns – For What It's Worth

System of a Down – Mezmerize & Hypnotize

The Black Dahlia Murder – Miasma

The Red Chord – Clients

Throwdown – Vendetta

Trivium – Ascendancy

Winds of Plague – A Cold Day In Hell
